mapper.select: SELECT '' AS CUST_NAME, B.IPG_AMT, B.APT_YMD, B.CARD_APPYNO, CASE WHEN B.IPG_AMT < 0 THEN 'N' ELSE CASE CHARINDEX('결재취소완료', B.IPG_RMK) WHEN 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END END AS CANCELABLE, B.IPG_RMK FROM TA_IPGUM_M A WITH(NOLOCK), TA_IPGUM_D B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.RPT_NO = B.RPT_NO AND A.RPT_SEQ = B.RPT_SEQ AND A.CA_GUBUN = 'A' AND A.RPT_NO = #{rpt_no} AND A.RPT_SEQ = #{rpt_seq}
